sentences.english: You can get the norwalk virus from hand to mouth activity or from contaminated food.
sentences.chinese: 你可以得到手诺瓦克病毒污染的食物或活动口。

sentences.english: Hold the mouth of a balloon filled with air. Let it go suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 捏紧一个充气的汽球口，然后突然松开手。

sentences.english: Conclusion Myofibroblast is the main cause to result in scar contracture of bilioenteric anastomosis.
sentences.chinese: 是导致胆肠吻合口瘢痕性挛缩的主要原因。

sentences.english: Most animals walking on four legs have long muzzles.
sentences.chinese: 大多数用四肢走路的动物口鼻部分都相当长。

sentences.english: Clean the injector port, replace critical injection port seals, replace injection port liners, and change septa as needed.
sentences.chinese: 清洗进样口，如有必要，更换密封垫，衬管，隔垫。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of leakage was made by clinical features or abdominal CT-scans.
sentences.chinese: 吻合口瘘的诊断主要依据临床表现和腹部CT。

sentences.english: A bulb syringe is often used for oral and nasal suction on infants and children .
sentences.chinese: 常常使用球吸引器抽吸婴幼儿的口鼻。

sentences.english: You can often save a person's life by breathing into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 采用口对口呼吸常能抢救一个人的生命。

sentences.english: A word once spoken cannot be taken back, even with a team of four horses.
sentences.chinese: 一句话说出了口，就是套上四匹马拉的车也难追上。

sentences.english: The doctor sliced his arm open right in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 医生当着我们的面在他胳膊上割开一条口。

sentences.english: He took a sip of tea making a slurping noise.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了口茶，发出嘶嘶的声音。

sentences.english: The intake manifold connects the carburetor to the intake ports of the engine.
sentences.chinese: 进气歧管把发动机进气道口连接起来。

sentences.english: Liu Mei discovered when suddenly want to back to chop wood field who drains.
sentences.chinese: 陆梅忽然想开初到砍木场时发现的阿谁下水口。

sentences.english: Smaller bites also help your body realize when it’s full.
sentences.chinese: 小口吃饭也容易让你的身体认识到自己吃饱了。

sentences.english: Next, cut from the outside edge of the circle to the inner circle, as shown.
sentences.chinese: 然后，从圆的外边缘到内孔剪一个口，如图所示。

sentences.english: Pour into sterilised jars and seal.
sentences.chinese: 倒入干净的果酱，然后封上口。

definition: readily/flatly (deny, admit and so on)/a mouthful/a bite
big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
to be able to read aloud fluently/to be suitable (easy enough) for reading aloud
to open one's mouth (to speak, esp. to make a request)/to gape
